Lucid <david@rari.capital> (https://github.com/davidlucid)","methods":{"_getPoolBalance(uint8,string)":{"details":"Returns the fund controller's balance of the specified currency in the specified pool (without checking `_poolsWithFunds` first).Ideally, we can add the view modifier, but Compound's `getUnderlyingBalance` function (called by `CompoundPoolController.getBalance`) potentially modifies the state.","params":{"currencyCode":"The currency code of the token.","pool":"The index of the pool."}},"approveTo0x(address,uint256)":{"details":"Approves tokens to 0x without spending gas on every deposit.","params":{"amount":"The amount of tokens to be approved.","erc20Contract":"The ERC20 contract address of the token to be approved."},"return":"Boolean indicating success."},"approveToPool(uint8,string,uint256)":{"details":"Approves tokens to the specified pool without spending gas on every deposit.","params":{"amount":"The amount of tokens to be approved.","currencyCode":"The currency code of the token to be approved.","pool":"The index of the pool."}},"constructor":{"details":"Constructor that sets supported ERC20 token contract addresses and supported pools for each supported token."},"depositToPool(uint8,string,uint256)":{"details":"Deposits funds to the specified pool.","params":{"amount":"The amount of tokens to be deposited.","currencyCode":"The currency code of the token to be deposited.","pool":"The index of the pool."}},"disableFund()":{"details":"Disables primary functionality of this RariFundController so contract(s) can be upgraded."},"enableFund()":{"details":"Enables primary functionality of this RariFundController once contract(s) are upgraded."},"getAllBalances()":{"details":"Ideally, we can add the view modifier, but Compound's `getUnderlyingBalance` function (called by `getPoolBalance`) potentially modifies the state.","return":"An array of currency codes, an array of corresponding fund controller contract balances for each currency code, an array of arrays of pool indexes for each currency code, and an array of arrays of corresponding balances at each pool index for each currency code."},"getDydxBalances()":{"details":"Returns the balances of all currencies supported by dYdX.","return":"An array of ERC20 token contract addresses and a corresponding array of balances."},"getPoolBalance(uint8,string)":{"details":"Returns the fund controller's balance of the specified currency in the specified pool (checking `_poolsWithFunds` first to save gas).Ideally, we can add the view modifier, but Compound's `getUnderlyingBalance` function (called by `CompoundPoolController.getBalance`) potentially modifies the state.","params":{"currencyCode":"The currency code of the token.","pool":"The index of the pool."}},"hasCurrencyInPool(uint8,string)":{"details":"Return a boolean indicating if the fund controller has funds in `currencyCode` in `pool`.","params":{"currencyCode":"The currency code of the token to check.","pool":"The index of the pool to check."}},"isOwner()":{"details":"Returns true if the caller is the current owner."},"marketSell0xOrdersFillOrKill(string,string,(address,address,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes,bytes,bytes,bytes)[],bytes[],uint256)":{"details":"Market sell to 0x exchange orders (reverting if `takerAssetFillAmount` is not filled or the 24-hour slippage limit is surpassed). We should be able to make this function external and use calldata for all parameters, but Solidity does not support calldata structs (https://github.com/ethereum/solidity/issues/5479).","params":{"inputCurrencyCode":"The currency code of the token to be sold.","orders":"The limit orders to be filled in ascending order of price.","outputCurrencyCode":"The currency code of the token to be bought.","signatures":"The signatures for the orders.","takerAssetFillAmount":"The amount of the taker asset to sell (excluding taker fees)."}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setAaveReferralCode(uint16)":{"details":"Sets the referral code for Aave deposits.","params":{"referralCode":"The referral code."}},"setDailyLossRateLimit(uint256)":{"details":"Sets or upgrades the daily limit on 0x exchange order loss over raw total fund balance.","params":{"limit":"The daily limit on 0x exchange order loss over raw total fund balance (scaled by 1e18)."}},"setFundManager(address)":{"details":"Sets or upgrades the RariFundManager of the RariFundController.","params":{"newContract":"The address of the new RariFundManager contract."}},"setFundRebalancer(address)":{"details":"Sets or upgrades the rebalancer of the RariFundController.","params":{"newAddress":"The Ethereum address of the new rebalancer server."}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"upgradeFundController(address)":{"details":"Sets or upgrades RariFundController by withdrawing all tokens from all pools and forwarding them from the old to the new.","params":{"newContract":"The address of the new RariFundController contract."}},"upgradeFundController(address,address)":{"details":"Sets or upgrades RariFundController by forwarding tokens from the old to the new.","params":{"erc20Contract":"The ERC20 contract address of the token to forward.","newContract":"The address of the new RariFundController contract."}},"withdrawAllFromPool(uint8,string)":{"details":"Withdraws all funds from the specified pool.","params":{"currencyCode":"The ERC20 contract of the token to be withdrawn.","pool":"The index of the pool."}},"withdrawAllFromPoolOnUpgrade(uint8,string)":{"details":"Withdraws all funds from the specified pool (without requiring the fund to be enabled).","params":{"currencyCode":"The ERC20 contract of the token to be withdrawn.","pool":"The index of the pool."}},"withdrawFromPool(uint8,string,uint256)":{"details":"Withdraws funds from the specified pool.","params":{"amount":"The amount of tokens to be withdrawn.","currencyCode":"The currency code of the token to be withdrawn.","pool":"The index of the pool."}},"withdrawFromPoolKnowingBalance(uint8,string,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Withdraws funds from the specified pool (caching the `initialBalance` parameter).","params":{"amount":"The amount of tokens to be withdrawn.","currencyCode":"The currency code of the token to be withdrawn.","initialBalance":"The fund's balance of the specified currency in the specified pool before the withdrawal.","pool":"The index of the pool."}}},"title":"RariFundController"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"getAllBalances()":{"notice":"Returns the fund controller's contract balance of each currency and balance of each pool of each currency (checking `_poolsWithFunds` first to save gas)."}},"notice":"This contract handles deposits to and withdrawals from the liquidity pools that power RariFund as well as currency exchanges via nodes.name: checkLossRateLimit

_getPoolBalance(uint8,string).details: Returns the fund controller's balance of the specified currency in the specified pool (without checking `_poolsWithFunds` first).Ideally, we can add the view modifier, but Compound's `getUnderlyingBalance` function (called by `CompoundPoolController.getBalance`) potentially modifies the state.

params.currencyCode: The currency code of the token.

approveTo0x(address,uint256).details: Approves tokens to 0x without spending gas on every deposit.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be approved.
params.erc20Contract: The ERC20 contract address of the token to be approved.

approveToPool(uint8,string,uint256).details: Approves tokens to the specified pool without spending gas on every deposit.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be approved.
params.currencyCode: The currency code of the token to be approved.

constructor.details: Constructor that sets supported ERC20 token contract addresses and supported pools for each supported token.

depositToPool(uint8,string,uint256).details: Deposits funds to the specified pool.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be deposited.
params.currencyCode: The currency code of the token to be deposited.

disableFund().details: Disables primary functionality of this RariFundController so contract(s) can be upgraded.

enableFund().details: Enables primary functionality of this RariFundController once contract(s) are upgraded.

getAllBalances().details: Ideally, we can add the view modifier, but Compound's `getUnderlyingBalance` function (called by `getPoolBalance`) potentially modifies the state.
getAllBalances().return: An array of currency codes, an array of corresponding fund controller contract balances for each currency code, an array of arrays of pool indexes for each currency code, and an array of arrays of corresponding balances at each pool index for each currency code.

getDydxBalances().details: Returns the balances of all currencies supported by dYdX.
getDydxBalances().return: An array of ERC20 token contract addresses and a corresponding array of balances.

getPoolBalance(uint8,string).details: Returns the fund controller's balance of the specified currency in the specified pool (checking `_poolsWithFunds` first to save gas).Ideally, we can add the view modifier, but Compound's `getUnderlyingBalance` function (called by `CompoundPoolController.getBalance`) potentially modifies the state.

params.currencyCode: The currency code of the token.

hasCurrencyInPool(uint8,string).details: Return a boolean indicating if the fund controller has funds in `currencyCode` in `pool`.

params.currencyCode: The currency code of the token to check.
params.pool: The index of the pool to check.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

marketSell0xOrdersFillOrKill(string,stri.details: Market sell to 0x exchange orders (reverting if `takerAssetFillAmount` is not filled or the 24-hour slippage limit is surpassed). We should be able to make this function external and use calldata for all parameters, but Solidity does not support calldata structs (https://github.com/ethereum/solidity/issues/5479).

params.inputCurrencyCode: The currency code of the token to be sold.
params.orders: The limit orders to be filled in ascending order of price.
params.outputCurrencyCode: The currency code of the token to be bought.
params.takerAssetFillAmount: The amount of the taker asset to sell (excluding taker fees).

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAaveReferralCode(uint16).details: Sets the referral code for Aave deposits.

setDailyLossRateLimit(uint256).details: Sets or upgrades the daily limit on 0x exchange order loss over raw total fund balance.

params.limit: The daily limit on 0x exchange order loss over raw total fund balance (scaled by 1e18).

setFundManager(address).details: Sets or upgrades the RariFundManager of the RariFundController.

params.newContract: The address of the new RariFundManager contract.

setFundRebalancer(address).details: Sets or upgrades the rebalancer of the RariFundController.

params.newAddress: The Ethereum address of the new rebalancer server.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeFundController(address).details: Sets or upgrades RariFundController by withdrawing all tokens from all pools and forwarding them from the old to the new.

params.newContract: The address of the new RariFundController contract.

upgradeFundController(address,address).details: Sets or upgrades RariFundController by forwarding tokens from the old to the new.

params.erc20Contract: The ERC20 contract address of the token to forward.
params.newContract: The address of the new RariFundController contract.

withdrawAllFromPool(uint8,string).details: Withdraws all funds from the specified pool.

params.currencyCode: The ERC20 contract of the token to be withdrawn.

withdrawAllFromPoolOnUpgrade(uint8,strin.details: Withdraws all funds from the specified pool (without requiring the fund to be enabled).

params.currencyCode: The ERC20 contract of the token to be withdrawn.

withdrawFromPool(uint8,string,uint256).details: Withdraws funds from the specified pool.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be withdrawn.
params.currencyCode: The currency code of the token to be withdrawn.

withdrawFromPoolKnowingBalance(uint8,str.details: Withdraws funds from the specified pool (caching the `initialBalance` parameter).

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be withdrawn.
params.currencyCode: The currency code of the token to be withdrawn.
params.initialBalance: The fund's balance of the specified currency in the specified pool before the withdrawal.

getAllBalances().notice: Returns the fund controller's contract balance of each currency and balance of each pool of each currency (checking `_poolsWithFunds` first to save gas).

userdoc.notice: This contract handles deposits to and withdrawals from the liquidity pools that power RariFund as well as currency exchanges via 0x.
